name: Crystalline (itch) (Nomron)
description:
Made in 3 days for Mini Jam #109. (Theme "depths," limitation "health is a tool")
Was a lot of fun working on it, even with a hefty dose of crunch haha. Also kinda sorta spiritual successor to my game No Dice (which you should not play).

Music, art, and code made by me. 
Sound effect credits can be found here.
Shoutout to my sibling for playtesting :)

Controls-

WASD/Arrows - Movement
Alternate mashing K and L - Charge flashlight
Left click - Shoot
Right click - Dash
